title: Packet Loss and Ping Spikes after any patch
body: Why is it that I always get packet loss and ping spikes in my games after any patch? My frames drop from the upper 100s down to a measly 30-50 fps and my ping spikes from a steady 30 to 500 - both simultaneously at the most inopportune times.

replies.body:
I'm not sure why this would happen specifically after every patch. Since patches only change local files in your League directory, they're **extremely unlikely** to impact your connection to our servers. These sorts of issues are typically caused by incompatible network settings on your local side, so I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure that's not the case.

Let me know if this resolved it for you.
I ran a Netalyzer and there is a major abnormality and several minor abnormalities. Should I continue this with a Support ticket or is it safe to post my results here?

It isn't safe to post the entire results here (the URL) since it includes your actual IP address, but if you've worked through the guide and are still having issues, it's a good time to escalate this to our tech team. I'd recommend running some network logs with our [**Hextech Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can get back to you.

Let me know if you run into any issues submitting your ticket.
